product_name: Swiss Army Spartan Swiss Army Knife
long_description: This compact pocket knife with two blades and other tools folds to 3.58 inches--perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your key chain. Includes a large blade, a small blade, a can opener with small screwdriver, a bottle opener with large screwdriver and wire stripper. Tweezers, a reamer with sewing eye, a corkscrew, a toothpick and a lanyard ring. Rugged Swiss stainless-steel components, sturdy nylon handles and aluminum interior housings ensure this knife will last for years. Crafted by Victorinox of Switzerland.
short_description: This compact pocket knife with two blades and other tools folds to 3.58 inches--perfect for slipping into your pocket or attaching to your key chain.
